faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Spanish law permits unrestricted property acquisition by non-resident foreigners without requiring Spanish residency or citizenship. The acquisition process involves straightforward legal documentation, tax identification numbers (NIE), and professional conveyancing support. Many Costa Blanca agents specialize in assisting international buyers through this transparent procedure.

For this €1,499,000 property, total acquisition costs would approximate €120,000-€150,000. These costs are transparent, predetermined, and clearly itemized during the purchase process.
